eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Troops arrive just in time to take control of the situation, and arrest the jianghu martial artists caught in the fray. As Zuo Le is about to take them in for questioning, the sword is once again taken by the mysterious man from the clinic.

attributes.content: Who was that man? He just came in, looked around, and left.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Could be a plainclothes from the Patrol Battalion, coming to see if there are smugglers here?
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: Plainclothes won't bumble like that or draw so much attention.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Then he came to cause trouble. I'll go and catch him.
attributes.name: Inn Assistant

attributes.content: How? He was gone in the blink of an eye. He clearly knows qinggong.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: That was the last inn. Nothing.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: The girl said she wanted to leave the city, but she's not at the gates.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: The doc had to use the best meds to treat her. What if she doesn't come back, and he puts the bill on my tab?
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I have to catch her.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I'm not sure I understand your analogy.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Ah, it wasn't the most apt.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I opened my little agency in Lungmen to make a living, but business ended up better than I expected.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Wei Yenwu and the L.G.D. can't deal with every little trouble out there.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We need good citizens like Mr. Lin to pitch in.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It can't be helped.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Can't be helped... that's true for Lungmen, and it's true for Yumen as well.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Yumen patrols the northern borders to repel potential threats to Yan.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Back when Originium technology was not so advanced, it took several times the manpower to run a mobile fortress like Yumen, compared to today.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A group of patriotic martial artists went to Yumen at the time. They never officially joined the army, but they helped out with all sorts of things.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Escorting Messengers, scouting the path ahead, even going into battle with the army... they played a key role in Yumen's peace and prosperity, and earned the respect of the city.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The court and jianghu were of one mind.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: This was how Yumen used to be... until twenty years ago.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The Shanhaizhong?
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Yes. Once again, the Shanhaizhong were the reason.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: There's nothing else.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I hope I didn't bother you in your duties. It would be on my head.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: You knew I wouldn't agree.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: A short whistle, then the tower's Originium lighting shuts off without warning, surrounding the pair in darkness.
A flickering flame lights up in the distance a second later.
The soldiers run back and forth, passing the torch between the beacons.
Seventeen roars of the drum, dragged through the night sky by the rapidly moving Yumen.
Today is the second day of the Wangfeng Festival.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It was created to remind the people of Yumen to remember the past.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: This meeting may have taken place earlier, or later.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: By then, you may have recalled a few things.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: I've never forgotten.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Do you remember how many of the heroes who died for Yumen were not soldiers?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: They owe Yumen nothing.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Nor does Yumen owe anyone anything.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Zuo!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Stand down.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It was my negligence that allowed those criminals into the city twenty years ago, disguised as Yumen martial artists. You can blame me, punish me, execute me!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: But the blame should fall only on meâor on you!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: All the responsibility falls upon me.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: And how have you taken responsibility? Alienating the brothers who gave blood and sweat for Yumen, driving them awayâis that your idea of taking responsibility?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yumen owes them an answer!
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Yumen belongs to Yan. All it does is in the service of the Yanese people. That's my answer.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: This meeting is over.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The name 'Shanhaizhong' is not widely known.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It wasn't that anyone was negligent. Everyone was so focused on guarding against external threats, they didn't realize there were enemies hiding in the shadows.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Bodyguards, bouncers, blacksmiths... these civilians often fought alongside the soldiers, and enjoyed a great deal of freedom in Yumen. The Shanhaizhong took advantage of this fact.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The city was caught off-guard and responded slowly. The Shanhaizhong's plot to destroy the city's power core was foiled, but only after heavy casualties had been taken.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: After that...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Taking measures after the fact is still better than not at all.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: But the measures might have gone too far.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: After that, the Lord Exorcist began to reform the city's administration, removing jianghu involvement, and setting increased restrictions on the movement of people.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Some of those who stayed joined the army. Others put their swords down and took up another living. An ordinary cook at an inn may have been a famous swordsman, back in the day.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Twenty years is plenty of time for a city to look very different.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Dad always says that there will come a day when Lungmen won't need downtown or the Rat King anymore.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: If there comes a day when this city no longer needs to patrol the barrenlands, then the people in the city won't need to carry swords anymore.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Times change. Some want to give it a push, others a pull. In the end, they're all left behind.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: That's the story that I heard. Does it help?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: A lot, actually.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: Thank you, Mr. Lee.
attributes.name: Lin YÃ¼hsia

attributes.content: What did you learn?
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Ten-man, two-hour shifts. No extra guards at the sand sluice.
attributes.name: Yumen Martial Artist

attributes.content: Just as I saw.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: One more thing to ask you to do.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: At the Hour of Yu, I want you to cause a little commotion around the sand sluice.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: Nothing too big, just draw away the patrols.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: What do you...?
attributes.name: Yumen Martial Artist

attributes.content: Ask no questions, if you still trust me.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Yumen Martial Artist

attributes.content: Did you see Zuo Xuanliao on the tower?
attributes.name: Yumen Martial Artist

attributes.content: Yes, I did.
attributes.name: Meng Tieyi

attributes.content: It's getting hotter...
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Someone attacked Wei Yenwu last night and threw the Yumen barracks into chaos. You were the assassin.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You cause abnormal weather wherever you go. Is this Arts? Or some other trick?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Murder of a Messenger, attempted theft of Catastrophe data, attempted assassination of a court official.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What do you think Yumen is, Shanhaizhong?!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A city headed the wrong way.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: This way is wrong. Go no further.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You know why Yumen is returning...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's not hard to guess.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Father tasked me to complete three tasks in three days: recover the Grandmaster's sword, catch the assassin, and track down the Shanhaizhong who have infiltrated the city.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It turns out all the answers were right here in the Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You won't complete any of them.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Stand back. This one's kung fu is unfathomable. We're no match for him.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You're not as strong as the Forte man, but you seem a little quicker on the uptake.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: So it was you who attacked Lord Taihe.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You dodged the last strike. Will you dodge or block the next one?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Neither.
He often told her that kung fu is like climbing a mountain, whether as a tool of revenge, or a way of life. The more treacherous the path, the steadier one's heart must be.
She saw her enemy, and she saw the mountain. That is why she spent five years with him.
If the battle cannot be won, she would seek to not lose.
Offense is the best defense?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: You have guts, I'll give you that...
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: But things are not as simple as you think.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: They cross swords, and she realizes her decision was imprudent.
She is facing another mountain.
Cold steel flashes before her face, the droplets on the blade touching her nose. She can hear her own heartbeat.
If the Record Keeper was here, he would have exclaimed that Qiubai recreated the move on the training ground.
Dive, stop, and turn around before hitting the arc of death, like the fowlbeast that narrowly avoids the waves on the river.
(Groans)
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You dodged again.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: How dare you!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You?
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Get out of the way, Zuo Le!
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Qiubai grabs Zuo Le by the collar and pulls him back.
He sees the foe's third swing, which lights up the yard.
It is March, but the Sword Forge feels like it is mid-summer. Even the night sky looks a little whiter in the heat wave.
There is only a pagoda tree behind them. There is nowhere to run.
The sword.
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Don't move!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You're still trying to take the sword? Do you want to get yourself killed?
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: You're not dying until you tell me where Meng Tieyi is, guawazi!
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: A burly man suddenly appears in the yard.
He grabs the girl and knocks away the sword in one fluid motion.
Like a bucket of cold water poured down on the ground, he forces everyone to scatter.
The heat disappears.
I've been looking for you.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Let me go!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: You almost got yourself killed.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: I told you to stay put in the clinic. Now you've made your injuries worse.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: You're still in Yumen, Huai?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Oh, it's you.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: Your shifu won't fight me until he's left his post. I have to wait for him.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: You haven't budged for three years?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: What's more important than this? Where can I find an opponent like him after he leaves Yumen?
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: There's a kung fu master right here in front of you. Why don't you have a go at her if it's a fight you're looking for?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: This woman?
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: You're in my way.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Something didn't feel right when I blocked that attack.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: It was heavy, but had neither form nor design. I don't know what that strange power is, but you're no master.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: I have no time for you.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: You hear that commotion inside, Jing?
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: That young man just broke in before I could stop him.
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: Damn.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: This is Tieyi's last workshop. He's been good to us. We need to protect it.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Master, Boss, there are more jianghu adventurers coming.
attributes.name: Alert Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: And Yumen soldiers behind them, coming from three directions, around a hundred in total.
attributes.name: Alert Shanhaizhong Member

attributes.content: No point wasting time here if the one we're looking for isn't here.
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Boss

attributes.content: Sudden silence. It is as though the cicadas were never there.
It is still March. The chill of early spring makes everyone shiver.
Let's go!
attributes.name: Shanhaizhong Ringleader

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's the one, Jing!
attributes.name: Wanderer

attributes.content: Where are you going, sir?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Out of my way!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Look at the mess here. Hardly anything left standing except the walls. You owe us an explanation.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: This is a Yumen military case. Anyone who interferes will be arrested.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wait... you're Zuo Xuanliao's kid.
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: So Zuo Xuanliao wants to take down the last Sword Forge now?
attributes.name: Jing

attributes.content: Impudence!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Zuo.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Did you see the Shanhaizhong on your way here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: We've sent men after them.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Good. Round them up and take them into custody.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Lord Zuo, there are dozens of them... all local residents...
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: They appeared right as the criminals retreated and obstructed our pursuit. They must be investigated thoroughly.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: All the rest have something to do with the case.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The girl in the exotic outfit was hiding in the Sword Forge. She must know where Meng Tieyi is. I'm going with you, if you take her away.
attributes.name: Du Yaoye

attributes.content: The Sword Forge is linked to the Shanhaizhong. Given your ties to Meng Tieyi, I would have asked you to come with us regardless.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: As for you...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: She's coming with me to get her wounds treated, and pay her bill.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: This is no time for jokes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I-I can't go with you...
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Hmph, all you care about is the sword.
attributes.name: Huai

attributes.content: Why youâ!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: Take these people back to the barracks for questioning. I'll go after the Grandmaster's sword.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you alright, Miss Qiu?
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Just a scratch. Do as Zuo Le says for now.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Please treat these jianghu people with proper respect, Millenion.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: That man...
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Noises continue to emanate from the direction of the Sword Forge, but Waai Fu stops in her tracks.
The figure on the roof vanished in the blink of an eye, as though it was just a gust of wind.
Waai Fu tightens her fist.
She has never been more certain.
